headline: How Recent Power Trends Are Shaping The Vistra (VST) Investment Story
summary: Why Vistra’s Updated Fair Value Is Edging Higher Vistra’s fair value estimate has been revised from about US$230.71 to approximately US$233.29 per share, with a slightly lower discount rate of roughly 7.90% to about 7.88% and a modestly softer revenue growth outlook at around 11.48% annually. This change reflects analysts’ views that emphasize persistent strength in power and capacity prices, data-center-driven electricity demand, and expectations for improving cash flows as Vistra executes...
